text: sillo junimkkeseo yeos-sae dong-an-e cheonjileul changjohasin hu gwonjwa-e oleu sin hananim isila geubun-eun bam-eul dueo naj-eul galigo tto seodulleo bam-euljjoch-eumyeo taeyang-gwa dalgwa byeoldeul-eul changjo hasieo geubun-ui gwonneung-alae dusieossdeola changjohasigo jabihasim-i geubun-ianinyo man-yuui junim-isin hananimkkeyeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo
